alert.note: Alert for Christian; Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 3:17PM CDT until June 11 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Taney County in southwestern Missouri... Southern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... Northern Stone County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 317 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crane, or 11 miles west of Highlandville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Galena around 325 PM CDT. Highlandville around 335 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Shepherd of the Hills State Park, Hurley, Spokane, Christian Center, Ponce de Leon, Chadwick, Chestnutridge, Selmore, Walnut Shade and Elsey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
